alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Lower Jefferson; Lower Lafourche; St. Charles; Upper Lafourche (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 3:24PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern St. Charles, southeastern Lafourche and central Jefferson Parishes through 430 PM CDT... At 324 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Larose to 6 miles northeast of Port Fourchon. Movement was northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 30 to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Larose, Cut Off, Galliano, Golden Meadow, Jean Lafitte, Lafitte, Barataria and Leeville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Lower Jefferson; Lower Lafourche; St. Charles; Upper Lafourche
